text: Kenneth Anger (born Kenneth Wilbur Anglemyer, February 3, 1927-May 11, 2023) was an American filmmaker, actor and author.The Kinsey Institute, Spotlight on the Collections: Filmmaker Kenneth Anger 2004. Retrieved June 1, 2010. He has been called "one of America's first openly gay filmmakers". His best known works were Inauguration of the Pleasure Dome (1954), Scorpio Rising (1964), Kustom Kar Kommandos (1965), and the gossip book Hollywood Babylon (1965). ==References== Category:1927 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American child actors Category:American novelists Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT screenwriters Category:LGBT directors Category:Gay men Category:Screenwriters from California Category:LGBT people from California Category:Movie directors from California Category:Actors from Santa Monica, California
title: Kenneth Anger
